mapper.sql: ID, OMS_ID,B0100, WORK_UNIT, NAME, HANDOVER_TIME, EXIT_TIME, EXIT_WAY, ZJLX, ZJHM, YXQZ, HANDOVER_START_QUERY_TIME, HANDOVER_END_QUERY_TIME, EXIT_START_QUERY_TIME, EXIT_END_QUERY_TIME, TRANSFEROR, RECEIVER, YEAR, BATCH_NUM, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME
mapper.select:
select octol.ID as id, #主键 octol.OMS_ID as omsId, #备案人员主键 octol.B0100 as b0100, #单位主键 octol.WORK_UNIT as workUnit, #工作单位 octol.NAME as name, #姓名 cc.SEX as sex, #性别 org.POST as post, #职务 org.REGISTE_RESIDENCE as registeResidence, #户口所在地 octol.HANDOVER_TIME as handoverTime, #交接时间 octol.EXIT_TIME as exitTime, #退出时间 octol.EXIT_WAY as exitWay, #退出方式 octol.ZJLX as zjlx, #证件类型 octol.ZJHM as zjhm, #证件号码 octol.YXQZ as yxqz, #有效期至 cc.CARD_STATUS as cardStatus, #证件状态 cc.SAVE_STATUS as saveStatus, #保存状态 cc.SURELY_WAY as surelyWay, #保管方式 cc.CABINET_NUM as cabinetNum, #机柜编号 cc.PLACE as place, #位置 cc.CSRQ as csrq, #出生日期 cc.QFJG as qfjg, #签发单位 cc.QFRQ as qfrq, #签发日期 cc.CSDD as csdd #出生地 from oms_cer_transfer_out_license octol join cf_certificate cc on octol.zjhm = cc.zjhm join oms_reg_procpersoninfo org on octol.OMS_ID = org.ID
octol.zjlx=#{zjlx} and octol.BATCH_NUM=#{batchNum} and
(octol.HANDOVER_TIME between #{handoverStartQueryTime} and #{handoverEndQueryTime}) and
(octol.EXIT_TIME between #{exitStartQueryTime} and #{exitEndQueryTime}) and
(octol.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')) and
order by octol.WORK_UNIT
select WORK_UNIT from oms_cer_transfer_out_license group by WORK_UNIT

select
from oms_cer_transfer_out_license
YEAR like concat(#{year},'%')
select * from oms_cer_transfer_out_license group by year
